name: Machinae Scooter
description:
Machinae Scooter is a blend of action and visual novel genre where you shoot enemies and read dialogue boxes.  In other words, the game is a short anime reference experience.

 Download Windows version for the best stability and graphics quality experience

Controls To shoot hold Right Mouse Button, then just spam Left Mouse Button
Press Space/Ctrl to get up/down
Press Shift to gain speed
Plot

The terrible Deus ex machina decided to turn Earth into its own gas station to charge robots and set up a wild intergalactic derby. You, as the last defenders of Earth, were supposed to stop it. However, not everything went according to plan…
